Text:
Hi boys and girls,

My name is Mark and I am one of the developers at Critical Studio.

We thank you for your interest in our game, and hope that, after having a chance to try a pirate version, you decide to buy it.

The game is currently available for $9.99 on Steam and several digital retailers, which is certainly not much.

We'll also keep updating and patching, we'll release a lot of additional content for free. If you are playing a pirated version, you will most likely be missing out in bug fixes and features.

This is also our first game. We are a small team of 11 people from Rio, Brazil, and the success of this game decides our future and our ability to keep making games (and keep making content for Dungeonland).

So, once again, thank you for your interest in our game. We hope you have fun, and we hope you choose to support us by buying a legitimate copy.

//Critical Studio Crew
@crit-mv i will buy this game as soon as i can buy dollars on internet

@crit-mv

HAHAHA, VAI TOMAR NO SEU CÚ SEU MERDA, EU JÁ VENDI 2 CÓPIAS PIRATAS  DESSE JOGO NA MINHA FACULDADE, NINGUÉM VAI COMPRAR ESSA MERDA ORIGINAL, NÃO VALE NEM 5 REAL (O PREÇO QUE EU VENDI).

@crit-mv

talvez vocês não entendam isso, mas a pirataria só vai ajudar o jogo a vender mais. se vocês lançam um jogo sem demo, esperam mesmo que as pessoas vão direto comprar o original? eu vou baixar o jogo e testar. se gostar, eu vou comprar através do steam. se não tivesse essa versão pirata, eu não compraria de jeito nenhum. então, que diferença faz pra vocês?

This game is awesome! So worth the 10 bucks! I mean come on! You can't get a decent lunch nowadays for 10 bucks. If you have a few friends just buy the 4-pack off steam. It is SO much fun as a drinking game. :3

Crit never said don't bother pirating, or condemning anybody for pirating, simply said if you like it, please support their company, I had never heard of this game and was going to try it out as well, and now that I have tried it I convinced a bunch of other friends to get it as well and due to the comments on being agnostic towards those that pirate it has gotten their company 8 new sales (2x4-pack)
